snippet: Mr. Oliver’s show, “Last Week Tonight,” is counterintuitive to the prevailing conventions of television, but has been a smash hit.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column holds British comedian John Oliver's Last Week Tonight has been big hit on HBO, with strong ratings, loyal fan base and series of videos on YouTube; notes weekly show, with audience of four million, is counterintuitive to prevailing conventions of television.
